name: HatshesputConvo
_source: # TODO - Set prereq for Clotho ending
# Have Hatshesput leave and maybe appear again later? Recruitable?
# This isn't very good. Rewrite later probably
speak;Simon;Excuse me?{w} I'm new in town, and I was wondering-
speak;Hatshepsut;Tis no action of mine.{w}{br}Our blessings alone are responsible.
speak;Simon;You're blessed by the Fates too?
speak;Hatshepsut;The Fates?{w} Oh, the gods of your land.{w}{br}I know no Fates.
speak;Hatshepsut;I was awoken by Horus, of the Sun.
speak;Simon;Horus...?{w} I've never heard of him.
speak;Hatshepsut;My land is far from yours.{w}{br}My journey was long.
speak;Simon;Are you bound to his will?
speak;Hatshepsut;No. A blessing is not a tether.{w}{br}Gods can bless those they think to be useful,{w}{br}but they can't control them.
speak;Simon;Maybe your gods. But the Fates are different.
speak;Hatshepsut;Perhaps so.{w} Or perhaps they wish you to believe so.
speak;Hatshepsut;Your land is indeed foreign to me.
speak;Hatshepsut;It is an ill omen for two blessed to be close by.
speak;Hatshepsut;In the tradition of my land, at least.
speak;Simon;It was good to meet you.
speak;Hatshepsut;A word of advice, blessed.{w}{br}Freedom can always be found across the sea.
speak;Simon;...{w} I hope we meet again someday.
